73117243.review:
Red Dead Redemption 2 is one of my favorite games. 

With deeply written memorable characters, unpredictable dialogue, and a story that grips you until the very end, Read Dead 2 is the most alive-feeling world I have ever experienced in a videogame. It gives you a real survival feel, without removing you from the immersion of the wild west that this game takes place in. 

On top of RDR2 having BY FAR the best story Rockstar games has ever presented, this game offers hunting, foraging, and character honor based off of your actions, which affects the story's outcomes. All of this is partially possible because of the grandiose map filled to the brim with impeccable detail, unique fauna, and ambient music that will send chills down your spine. Even after the story is completed, there is still plenty to do in the vast world of this game. 

Overall, Red Dead Redemption 2 is one of the best orchestrated games I have ever had the pleasure of experiencing. From feeling like I was a part of the Van Der Linde Gang to mourning Arthur Morgan's hardships right along with him, RDR2 is an experience I believe everyone should witness. It's the game that keeps on giving, even for the $60 pricetag.

73109317.review:
Red Dead Redemption 2-это, по моему мнению, лучшая игра-вестерн, когда либо выходившая и это одна из моих любимых игр.
[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
1. Открытый мир. Он невероятно проработан, в нём множество мелких деталей, отличных дополнительных квестов, интересная охота, а также куча разных мест, начиная от лесов, заканчивая пустынями и заснеженными горами.
2. Сюжет здесь очень интересен, он не даёт заскучать и вызывает очень бурные эмоции и может вызвать как улыбку так и грусть.
3. Персонажи. Их здесь огромное множество, у них у всех свой характер, который раскрывается по ходу сюжета или в дополнительных квестах, но самый большой отпечаток в моём сердце конечно же оставил главный герой-Артур Морган.
4. Графика. Она просто великолепна, как при дневном свете, так и при лунном.
5. Шикарные саундтреки.
[h1]Минусы:[/h1]
1. Оптимизация. Да, со времён релиза на пк её улучшили, но она всё равно довольно сильно хромает.
2. Система репутации очень странная и глупая, вам могут повысить её за то, что вы поздоровались с человеком, а могут понизить её за то, что вы вырубили бандита, который хотел вас ограбить, угрожая оружием.
[h1]Оценка:[/h1]
90/100

73086839.review:
[h1] Обзор только сюжетного режима RDR 2! [/h1]

 [b] Red Dead Redemption 2 для меня является одной из самых лучших игр за все время. Я влюбился в эту игру с самых первых часов игры и со временем мой интерес к ней только возрастал. RDR 2 имеет кучу положительных моментов, но также присутствуют и отрицательные моменты, как и в любой другой игре. [b]

 
[h1] Плюсы: [/h1]

[*] Сюжет.
Если честно, то я не ожидал такого от Rockstar. Диалоги, персонажи, постановка кат сцен, и озвучка они идеальны. Теперь я стал понимать почему Rockstar не озвучивают свои игры на разные языки. Финал игры, заставивший меня заплакать - это то ради чего стоит купить и пройти игру.

[*] Графика.
Графика в RDR 2 прекрасна. Освещение мягкое и приятное глазу, от него не хочется выколоть себе глаза. Текстуры качественные и к ним вопросов нет. Следы грязи на одежде и лошади при падении, реалистичный снег, отражения, следы на грязи и рябь воды в них - это лишь маленькая часть из всего того, что присутствует в этой игре. На мой взгляд здесь есть очень заметный косяк в графике, о нем я расскажу ниже в минусах.

[*] Геймплей. 
Геймплей здесь весьма медлителен. Перед покупкой я думал, что из-за медленного геймплея мне эта игра не понравиться, но как же я сильно ошибался. Стрельба реализована на высшем уровне и я бы не назвал скучной. Езда на лошади ощущается лучше чем в любых других играх, в которые я играл. 

[*] Квесты, случайные события и дополнительные активности. 
 У каждого из квестов уникальная история, за которой интересно наблюдать. В этой игре присутствует множество доп. активностей от охоты и рыбалки до ограбления поездов и магазинов. Также бродя по лесу можно встретить лагерь бандитов или беглого заключенного, который тебя просит прострелить оковы.


[h1] Минусы: [/h1]

[*] Затянутость сюжета.
Сюжет очень сильно затянут и создается такое чувство, что это делали специально для того, чтобы люди больше играли в эту игру или вовсе перестали в нее играть. Основные интересные события начинаются только в середине 3 главы.

[*] Некоторые технические проблемы.
Конечно же наши любимые баги, но к счастью их здесь не так уж и много. Главная и наверное единственная проблема с графикой - это сглаживание. FXAA не изменяет ничего, а MSAA жрет ОЧЕНЬ много FPS. И остается лишь TAA, который нормально убирает лесенки, но ПИПЕЦ КАК СИЛЬНО мылит картинку.

[*]  Большая часть карты - это леса и маленькие города. (Момент, который для меня кажется небольшим минусом)
Кому как, но лично мне не очень зашло то, что большая часть игрового мира это леса и поля. Конечно здесь есть города, но почти все они кажутся лишь небольшой деревней.  К моему счастью в rdr 2 есть огромный цивилизованный город Сен-Дени, но для меня этого маловато. Мне хотелось бы немного больше цивилизации. Я понимаю, что RDR 2 это не про цивилизацию, но все таки конец 19 века и хотелось бы видеть эту эпоху во всей красе. И все же это не повод из-за этого хейтить и засирать эту прекрасную игру.

 [h1] Вывод [/h1]

Red Dead Redemption 2 не является ГТА в конце 19 века с ковбоями. Это совершенно другой продукт, которому это не нужно. Игра очень сильно меня зацепила и мне было приятно провести в ней свое время. Игра стоит своих денег и я ни разу не жалею о покупке. 

[h1] Игра шедевр - 9.8 из 10 [/h1]

72953364.review:
GTA in the Wild West--inherits the amazing writing and acting of GTA but also carries over the weak shooting/movement mechanics. That said, the environments and the interactions with them--exploring, hunting, foraging, fishing--are astounding. The NPC interactions are immersive. The overall sense of being in the world is probably the best I've seen in any game.

For the first 40 hours or so I was definitely convinced that this was a contender for best game ever. After a while the charm of the drawn out dismount/skinning/opening drawers/etc. animations started to wear off but I still appreciate how the slower pace of things draws you into the world.

PS. Arthur Morgan is a bad man. Don't get too attached to the idea of making him into a hero.

72952331.review: 这种像名著一般的游戏真的是玩一部少一部，强烈推荐

72951287.review:
首先声明，这个差评是给线上模式不是给故事模式的，以下通篇都是吐槽线上模式
先放结论，故事模式做的有多惊艳，线上模式就做的有多垃圾
一点一点来吐槽

    [b]1.[/b]首当其冲的就是代入感，GTA5里你能洗澡看电视这些故事模式里能干的事情线上也能做，而到了大镖客里，我没法进旅馆洗澡，不能去剧院看节目，我更想体验的是以我玩的角色来代入这个西部生活。亚瑟能玩戳手指的小游戏，而我到了线上却只能打扑克。玩线上模式能明显感觉到，自己能与这整张地图里的东西互动的内容极少。

    [b]2.[/b]线上初期劝退。我相信每一个玩家想体验的线上要么是流畅的多人模式剧情（PVE），要么是酣畅淋漓的多人对战（PVP），这些内容R星在处理新手入门时都没做好。首先玩家做完一开始主线后，就把你扔在了游戏最偏远的地区，你的下一个主线在地图的另一端，好嘛，要想接着做主线得骑着破马十分钟赶路，之后的每一个主线都是越来越远，而游戏初期穷的要命我觉得大多数人还是不愿意传送的。这种游戏体验在初期是十分难受的。

   [b]3.[/b]如果你有幸熬过了初期剧情，开始了自己的多人游戏生涯，那么摆在你面前，最大的问题就是，[b]充钱[/b]。游戏有非常严格的等级限制，基本上所有的东西都被等级限制，如果你想解锁要么刷等级要么氪金直接解锁，这是我觉得最恶心的一点，线上模式你想一分钱不充体验全部内容基本上不可能，特别是你要玩4个职业的话，那基本上是必充了。整个线上模式逼氪特别严重，特别是前期收入少的可怜，酿酒这个职业要商贩刷到5级才给解锁（或者充钱直接解锁）。我玩的时候感觉每花一块钱都心在流血，只能等游戏每周更新福利才去消费一下。

    [b]4.[/b]如果你有钱充了金块，开始了快乐的职业生涯，你就会发现这每个职业都巨坑无比。

       商贩：最浪费时间的职业，但是是前期为数不多的赚钱手段之一。你要打猎（建议直接背动物尸体不要剥皮），然后要去抢马车给老头给你加工产品，最后还要你自己去送货。前期效率低的话玩1,2个小时赚100美元不到，谢谢R星，让我在大镖客里深刻感受到了美国底层劳动人民的艰辛。

       赏金猎人：最垃圾的职业，升级效率最低的职业。如果是做普通的通缉任务，R星压根没想好好做潜行系统，所以要么据点门口开枪把目标吓出来抓了，要么直接大开杀戒然后把目标抓了。时常还有bug，比如目标压根不会跑或者目标不在地图上显示。传奇的通缉任务，不能自己手动调难度，就不能死盯着一个任务反复刷，这个太恶心人了，有的任务随着难度升高还不告诉你这个任务一个人做不了。花5到10分钟做普通赏金任务，赚10块钱左右。做传奇赏金任务，我记得4星难度，也就160块。赏金这个职业，又穷又无聊还升级慢。

      收藏家：升级最快的职业，最有用的职业，能刷钱还能快速升级你的角色。如果你和我一样以前是育碧开放世界全收集玩家，那你玩收藏家就不会觉得无聊。对着网站上[url=store.steampowered.com]（https://jeanropke.github.io/RDR2CollectorsMap/）[/url]的地图挨个收集就完事了。简单粗暴，我就是一边刷哔哩哔哩一边收集收藏品的。

      酿酒师：真正的养老职业，只需要做几个支线任务就可以把酿酒成本降到最低，然后挂机等酿酒就完事了。最后送货的距离还比商贩要近的多，赚的比商贩也要多还轻松。有了酿酒师之后我都没做过商贩了。但是酿酒师的bug很多，比如黑屏bug，运气不好把你酿的酒卡没了。有的时候你进小屋还会发现npc不见了没法酿酒。酿酒师如果碰到服务器差或者网络不稳定，收益会差很多。

    [b]5.[/b]如果职业这口大shi你都能咽下去，那么最最最无语的，游戏环境，它来了。我本人是在英国我也不太清楚服务器怎么划分的，不过就游戏环境而言。遇到挂壁大开杀戒，那你职业任务算是不用做了，直接溜吧，百做了。遇到低素质玩家恶意攻击你送货什么的，也只能自认倒霉。当然我也碰到过酿酒运货的时候，好心路人帮忙解围，遇到山贼劫道的时候路人也来帮忙，就很有西部内味了。但是外挂，以及我在欧洲都不稳定的服务器，在一次次折磨着我的耐心。你想想，辛辛苦苦折腾1,2个小时就为了赚几百块钱，容易吗我，最后还啥都没了心态不爆炸了？

    [b]6.[/b]如果这都没有劝退你玩线上模式，那老八直呼内行。最后就是，游戏bug了，线上bug太多了甚至直接影响到游戏体验了。比如莫名其妙的爆炸，我也不知道是不是外挂，就做主线任务的时候都会碰到敌人突然爆炸了，马也炸了，场面一度十分混乱。我还碰到过营地扣钱的bug，本来是每天扣钱，结果不知道是服务器炸了还是怎么，变成每秒扣钱了，看着每秒钟我的钱在扣，让本就不富裕的打工仔雪上加霜。

说到这了，你肯定会问，那PVP内容呢，说得好。因为PVP根本没人玩，匹配不到人。自由任务的匹配你又会发现卡的要死，角色根本动不了。

总而言之，大镖客的线上模式，体验极差，更像是半成品，还逼氪严重，质量远不如GTA5，而且也很难达到GTA5的自由度。只是喜欢西部风格的我们，聊以自慰罢了，

72941388.review:
There is no "mixed feelings" button for reviews but I'll have to give it a thumbs down but for aspects I hope get fixed and that are currently plaguing the game from living up to it's predecessor which was great. Overall, if you are looking for a good story, the game offers that even with some negative gameplay flaws concerning the single player that are abysmal to deal with and while I don't think it's as good as the first story in general, it works for what it is with this expansive and great atmosphere/world. I would pick this up on sale for the singleplayer if you are interested in just that. 

However my main point is the online in which Rockstar has completely ruined via microtransactions. So much of the online is grinding to get money to buy guns so that you can have fun or steeds that you can use in racing or grinding gold bars just to customized said items or "pursue" a role which are just menial tasks with no development. The online is already barren in terms of missions, heists, mini-games that are in single-player but not in multiplayer, and overall fixes for the absolute framework of the game revolving around payouts/glitches/disconnections/etc... And I just don't want to play a Rockstar game after this if the player is going to be completely devoid of fun in order to draw out more time I waste on it.

Can you have fun? Absolutely, why would I spend all night playing poker with my friends getting full houses in a row if I didn't or why would I lasso the crap out of them if it wasn't. But the problem is that Rockstar is taking away from the big stuff which is already lacking in terms of overall content of said "big stuff". I've played the first Red Dead Online and it was fantastic fun and I really had no problems with it except for the map being less diverse then what we have now. But the fun has just been sucked out if you aren't playing with friends so you can grind for levels and stuff in order to "have fun". I've considered already getting a mod menu for this game at the risk of getting banned in order to just have fun with the game with my friends and while I don't recommend doing so at the risk of ban, you'd probably have more fun in the 24 hours it would take Rockstar to catch it then the 2 years of drought season for content other than battle pass crap and inflated prices on guns or even a pair of pants. Really nothing has changed since the beta on PS4 and I hope that Rockstar will learn from this but they probably won't considering the amount of people who buy microtransactions and the standards that games have to meet now which are really, really, really, low.

72858912.review:
I would 100% recommend Red Dead Redemption II especially for those those who have not played the first Red Dead Redemption. It is a game that is rich in strongly defined side missions, characters are principled and effected by the world. 

I am not a fan of the Grand Theft Auto series. The way the shooting plays out in that game seems kind of silly for modern weapons but seems to fit beautifully in this era of United States rough and tumble Romanticized Westerns.

If you are here for a game with a solid shooter system, that his rich characters that change over time, and emotional investments that consistently shatter. Red Dead Redemption has for me personally been the most redeeming game for my belief in Rock Star Studios. 

Now for people asking if it is worth $60? Yes if you can get it on sale it was borderline theft. You might as well have a bounty upon installing the game. I personally thought the game ended in multiple chapters at multiple times but the content just kept going. It was beautiful!

As far as Red Dead Online, its been a while so it is pretty not alive, but even the online has a mini story you can do which is extremely cool bonus feature for the solo player. 

Anyway this is going to end the review for me and ill see you out there Black Lung. 

*Tips hat with Revolver, Whistling Johnny Cash as I walk into the saloon to shoot that no good card cheating curr.*

72807012.review:
Após terminar de completar toda a história principal e a maioria das missões secundárias do jogo, acho que já posso fazer uma análise substanciosa da minha experiência até o momento. E, bom, eu não tenho quase nenhuma crítica negativa em relação a Red Dead Redemption 2. O enredo é espetacular. A jogabilidade e interação com o mundo do jogo são únicas. Os gráficos são excepcionais. Os níveis de detalhes e de realismo do jogo são absurdos [strike] (o saco do cavalo encolhe no frio...) [/strike] e promovem uma vivência única com todo aquele cenário apresentado ao longo da jogatina, sendo que até mesmo uma exploração despretensiosa do mundo aberto pode resultar em muitos momentos divertidos. Ou seja, o jogo é quase perfeito. E quando eu digo "quase", é porque um detalhe negativo deve ser evidenciado: a parte da otimização. 
             Sim, eu sei que o jogo é pesado, por conta da quantidade de efeitos e de detalhes, mas mesmo assim, o desempenho de RDR2 podia ser melhor - principalmente nas máquinas que atendem aos requisitos recomendados para o jogo. Até porque, por esse preço nada amigável, esperava-se uma maior preocupação da Rockstar Games com esse aspecto relacionado aos PCs...
              Mesmo assim, esse detalhe de maneira alguma tira o brilho do jogo no geral, apesar de servir como um alerta: prepare sua máquina para rodá-lo com decência, ou uma parte considerável da sua imersão será comprometida. 
              Se você já cumpre esse requisito e pensa em comprar o jogo, a pergunta que eu te faço é: Você está pronto(a) pra viver uma experiência definitiva de velho oeste americano?

OBS EDIT: O modo online precisa urgentemente de reparos, pois as quedas de servidor são extremamente frequentes e muito frustrantes (até hoje não consegui terminar a primeira missão online por conta desse problema...).

72792289.review: For many years, I would reply with, "Grand Theft Auto:  San Andreas", if asked what's my favourite game of all time, and it still holds a very fond, nostalgic place in my heart.  Both GTA's 4 and 5 missed the mark, for me, by a large margin.  I can't exactly tell you why, but I just never felt a real connection or had a lasting hold with those two.  But I can easily say, that Red Dead Redemption Two, has definitely recaptured that feeling within me --as GTA:SA did-- all those years ago, when I was just a young gamer.  I'd almost forgotten what it's like to be so completely immersed and absorbed into a game.  At my age, I thought maybe the playful side of me was gone and perhaps I'd never find such a strong connection with a game again.  But RDR2 is just such an awe-inspiring work of art, such a beautiful and detailed creation.  I even went out and bought a better graphics card, just to be able to play this game and experience it's full potential.  I already had a decent one (Nvidia 900 series, 2gb whatever), but I bought a GeForce GTX 1660 Super, 6gb GDDR6 Ventus XS.  It was well worth the investment, because I know I'll be coming back to this game again and again for years to come, the way I replayed GTA:SA over and over and over!

72766178.review:
Red Dead Redemption 2, a game that needs no real introduction. Rockstar really outdid themselves this time.

The Good:
- The level of customization the player has over Arthur is absolutely amazing. From his hair, to his beard, to his clothes, to his weight, calling right back to when CJ could get fat or skinny in San Andreas.
- The weapons handle well, and feel like they have real weight to them. As well, being able to plate every gun in gold is a nice touch.
- The story, side missions, and lore are all amazing, and some of the best not just in the series, but that Rockstar has made in the past 20 years.
- Being able to switch from first to third person is great, and can be useful in more tactical situations, though the transition can be a bit painful.
- The honor and bounty system work well, and disguising oneself before a robbery is not just fun, but also very realistic.

The Bad:
- The animations, while nice, can get tiresome after a while. Sometimes you don't want to pick up that can of beans realistically, or grab a man's body to get a pocket watch.
- It's easy to accidentally piss everyone off, and can make paying off a bounty a chore.
- Fist fights are painful.
- Having to unlock everything before being able to purchase it really damages replay value.

The Ugly
- Lowering the graphics can result in some strange texture errors, lighting errors, reflection errors, and particle errors.
- The lack of plans for an Undead Nightmare expansion, despite the existence of a special and ultimate edition, leaves a lot to be desired.
- You can't talk about RDR2 without mentioning the horrible working conditions that went on during its development. Crunch time and abuse that was rivaled only by Naughty Dog and Konami plagued development, and though the end result is great, it's hard to support the practice. Though Rockstar claims it will no longer be continuing this practice, it's hard to know just how honest they are.

Ultimately, the game is amazing. However, if you, like me, have trouble supporting Rockstar after the conditions the team went through came to light, you might sleep better if you don't buy it, buy it on sale, or get it for free.

72742181.review:
你的下一部游戏，并不一定是游戏。

（此篇评测含少量剧透）

荒野大镖客2在我看来，是一部优秀的互动式电影，是目前最佳的西部角色扮演类剧情游戏，浓缩了19世纪末期美国社会的变迁，爱，责任，帮派对立，枪战，牛仔等元素在游戏中淋漓尽致的体现了出来。

亚瑟是个粗人，没有什么文化，但他懂得责任，忠于自己的帮派，懂得如何保护，去爱自己的家人，为家人赴汤蹈火仍在所不辞；懂得是非，有一颗善良的心，嫉恶如仇，对待坏人毫不仁慈，有时却帮助一位可怜的修女去夺回属于自己的东西。

达奇范德林德帮派里的每一位成员都是有血有肉的刻画了出来：哈维尔、何西阿、西恩等等，强烈的代入感使得我自己在游玩过程中，对帮派成员的死亡痛心不已，彷佛自己就是亚瑟摩根，仿佛自己就是驰骋在西部世界的亡命牛仔。对帮派成员的背叛则痛心和愤懑，甚至想亲手杀死迈卡。

第一次写这么长的评价，我给这部游戏满分，他满足了我作为牛仔的梦想，让我欣赏到各种美丽的景色，几乎不重复的剧情，每个剧情都有独特的过场动画和任务。让人爱不释手

最后一句话

狂暴的快乐往往预示着狂暴的结局，那欢愉的刹那，正如火与火药，一吻即逝。——威廉莎士比亚 

Die well， 死得其所，大概说的就是19世纪牛仔的真实写照吧。

72678913.review:
red dead redemption 2 is the best game i have ever played in my entire life. this is why. i first got it as an alteretive to GTA5, the graphics looks awsome and it simulates reality the same way as the grand theft auto series does. anyways. i bought the game and i started playing. it starts off up in the snowy mountains and its hard to really experience the open world aspect of it in those first hours. that forced me to play the story missions before anything else. you play as Arthur Morgan. an old outlaw that lives in the west side of america with his gang of other outlaws. the year is 1899 and america is slowly becoming a land of laws, civilization and order. that gives the whole thing sutch an amazing nature. Arthur or any of his gang members have lived their entire lifes as homeless men just on the run from rival gangs in small towns. but suddenly cities are starting to shape up. the police and private detectives called the "pinkertons" are starting to hunt down the remaining gangs in america. thats when arthur and his gang are forced to move. you are going trough a breathtaking journey through desserts, swamplands and even a tropical island that the gang was washed up on after a boat sank during a failed robbery. suddently everybody starts to turn against eachother and of course there is a traitor in the gang. the game has an "honor" system that gives good points when you do good things like for example pet dogs or help people. and you get bad points for doing bad things like killing and robbing. the game takes a diffrent turn based on how you play the game. it has a completly diffrent ending if you play as a bad guy for example. anyways i started to play the game on cristmas day 2018 and i was quickly dragged into it. i could't do anything else after that point. i played and played and played. no other game ever could give me feelings of strong emotions like red dead redemption 2 did. fear, joy, and anger.
rockstar simply outdid themself this time and i can never ever even imagine a game close to this ever being created again.
i am currently on my 4th playtrough and im still learning more and more things about the game. maybe the online is a little bit rusty at the moment. red dead redemption can offer the best multiplayer experiences ever. and im not even going to start talking about the mods for the game. when you are in the world of red dead redemption 2 it feels like you really are there in a weird way. every simple NPC has a house or appartment, wakes up everyday and goes to its job. your hair and beard grows a little bit every in game day and people will even notice if you changed your apperance. every single detail makes sence. there is nothing in the game that dosen't provide a feeling of joy. from fishing to hunting to even explore the enourmos map thats around 5 gta maps
its not just the gameplay itself that makes the game good. its the writers incredible ability to tell a story. you can understand exactly how all the characters feel. even the "bad" ones. its like a 4D story. you understand every single part of it

但是，我却没有被他救赎。看着亚瑟默默闭上眼的那一刻，他解脱了，我心里却在煎熬，我一定要亲手杀死麦卡和达奇。但是r星没让我这么做，没有让约翰亲手把匕首扎进达奇的心脏，没有让亚瑟用枪把子弹打进麦卡的头颅并摔入山下，而是让达奇一枪打死了麦卡，没有任何痛苦，没有任何感觉。或许达奇在这个时候被亚瑟和约翰救赎了，放弃了黑水镇的钱一走了之，但是我依旧没有被亚瑟被杀死后麦卡和达奇的苟且偷生中被救赎。

72613082.review:
一周目的时候大镖客对我来说就是一份满分的神作了，但一周目对我来说更像是看了一场电影，而不是一款游戏，我快速地推着剧情，欣赏着亚瑟.摩根的传奇一生，当时的我结束一周目后一个铁血男儿哭的一塌糊涂，仔细思索后我不认为自己有这个资格写下这篇测评，所以在一周目结束了两个月后我开启了我的二周目之旅，在这次游戏中我不再走马观花而是更加细致地追寻游戏中的每一个细节，每一个彩蛋，每一个隐藏剧情，而且也花了大量的时间刷齐了主线任务中的一百多块金牌，观察并狩猎了每一种动物，找齐全部的草药和花卉，在一个个酒馆打着一次次白给的扑克。。。一周目结束时我是鹿结局并且选择护送着约翰，因为我认为这是最符合亚瑟的做法，或者说是最符合我心中亚瑟的选择，二周目刚开始时我心里想着这次要做一个恶人，看看狼结局，但到了第六章还是没忍心，我实在无法让亚瑟接收这样的结局，即便这是一个游戏，有无数重来的机会，但我还是不忍心。我选择了拿钱，不是因为别的就是要在最后用亚瑟最后的力量给某人脸上留个记号！百分百完成度我是在昨天终于实现的，在百分百完成的剧情出现的一刻我没有我想象的那么激动·，而更像是一份释然，轻轻呼出一口气，这一个月来的所有寻找，所有被挑战卡住时的无奈，所有任务达不成金牌而一遍又一遍焦躁的重复都烟消云散了，也许这就是这个游戏的魅力，这份艺术品的魅力。
谨以此篇测评纪念我的大镖客之旅，一个在此之前从未百分百完成任何游戏的咸鱼参上。

Ancak merak edenler için Rockstar'ın Türkiye dağıtıcısı ve yayıncısı olan firmadan bir arkadaşımla görüştüğüm kadarıyla iptalin 2 sebebinin olduğunu söylediler. Kendilerinin dil desteği vermeme sebeplerinin en büyüğü de Türkiye'de oyunun satışı olmamasıymış yani buradaki dağıtıcıya öyle bilgi verilmiş ki bence crack ve torrentin Steam'den daha çok bilindiğini varsayarsak doğruluk payı da oldukça fazla. 72575321.review:
The game is rad. Just gonna stick these graphical settings here in case I need them later:

[b]Texture Quality:[/b] Ultra
[b]Isotrophic Filtering:[/b] 16x
[b]Lighting Quality:[/b] Medium
[b]Global Illumination:[/b] High
[b]Shadow Quality:[/b] High
[b]Far Shadow Quality:[/b] High
[b]SSAO:[/b] Ultra
[b]Reflection Quality:[/b] Medium
[b]Mirror Quality:[/b] Ultra
[b]Water Quality:[/b] Medium
[b]Volumetrics:[/b] Medium
[b]Particle Quality:[/b] Ultra
[b]Tesselation:[/b] Ultra
[b]TAA:[/b] Medium
[b]FXAA:[/b] OFF
[b]MSAA:[/b] OFF

[b]Vulkan or DX12:[/b] I find that DX12 offers a smoother experience, and is slightly better visually, but it also runs about 10fps slower than Vulkan, so I prefer Vulkan just to achieve that 55-60FPS mark. Experiment with your game, either option might work better for you.

[b]Near Volumetric Quality:[/b] Low
[b]Far Volumetric Quality:[/b] Medium
[b]Volumetric Lighting Quality:[/b] High
[b]Unlocked Volumetric Raymarch Resolution:[/b] On
[b]Particle Lighting Quality:[/b] Medium
[b]Soft Shadows:[/b] High
[b]Grass Shadows:[/b] Medium
[b]Long Shadows:[/b] On
[b]Full Resolution SSAO:[/b] Off
[b]Water Refraction Quality:[/b] Medium
[b]Water Reflection Quality:[/b] High
[b]Water Physics Quality:[/b] High
[b]TAA Sharpening:[/b] Any
[b]Motion Blur:[/b] (User preference. I personally think it helps a bit in smoothing out the game play)
[b]Reflection MSAA:[/b] X2
[b]Geometry Level of Detail:[/b] 3 of 5
[b]Grass Level Detail:[/b] 4 of 10
[b]Tree Quality:[/b] High
[b]Parallax Occlusion Mapping Quality:[/b] Ultra
[b]Decal Quality:[/b] Ultra
[b]Fur Quality:[/b] High
[b]Tree Tessellation:[/b] Off

[b]IMPORTANT![/b]
You need to manually change a file in your system.xml document to achieve ultra-looking visuals. These settings automatically set it to low, and you can't change this specific setting in-game, you have to do it in that file. It doesn't affect performance [i]at all.[/i] Your system.xml file should be in:

[i]Documents\Rockstar Games\Red Dead Redemption 2\Settings[/i]

[b]MAKE SURE TO BACK UP THE FILE. IF YOU DON'T, YOU'LL HAVE TO INPUT ALL GRAPHICAL SETTINGS AGAIN IF SOMETHING GOES WRONG.[/b]

Open it with Notepad++ or any other notepad editor and ctrl+f, search for deepsurfacequality. When you find it, it should look like this:

[i]<deepsurfaceQuality>kSettingLevel_Low</deepsurfaceQuality>[/i]

[b]Change it from Low to Ultra.[/b]

[i]<deepsurfaceQuality>kSettingLevel_Ultra</deepsurfaceQuality>[/i]

And voilà, you're good to go! You can also change furdisplayquality from high to ultra in that file, but it's not that important. It'll make fur look slightly better at no performance cost, but I didn't notice much a difference. And that's it! Make sure you save the file, then you can start playing the game with (hopefully) good performance, and it won't look terrible!

72525272.review: This game takes immersion to another level.  It's like another world inside your pc.  The acting is out of this world and the writing and character arcs are all executed perfectly.  The story is 10/10 up until chapter 5, which starts making the game feel  very repetitive and boring. 72522672.review:
Red Dead 2 is a beautiful art project which fails to be a game. As a long time fan of RPGs with thousands of hours in various open-world series, and someone who 100%'d RDR1 within a week of it's release, I wanted to like this game. I really did.

Rockstar created a visually beautiful, artistic, masterpiece of storytelling, but it is hidden behind countless unfun barriers which exist for seemingly no reason than to annoy the player. Lack of fast travel. Paths on the minimap not being given automatically during quests. Horses unpredictably tripping and falling over and ruining dramatic chases. Bounty hunters and witnesses spawning out of thin air, far out in the wilderness. Dead-eye shots missing despite the game automatically marking them for you. Enemies taking anywhere from 1 to 7 body shots to kill. Being teleported away from your horse and unable to call it, being forced to walk to the nearest town.

These are just a handful of the frustrating and poorly-designed yet seemingly intentional mechanics Rockstar put in this game. Games should not be life-simulators, and when your attempts at immersion create frustrating and unfun mechanics for players, you have failed as a developer. There are no options to configure any of these mechanics, and Rockstar has done everything in their power to prevent players from modding their games in any way to allow players to fix it themselves.

Somewhere, there is probably a good game hidden here, but I don't have the patience to find it.

72511837.review: Red Dead Redemption 2 огромное, дорогое и размеренное приключение, в которое не играешь, а получаешь в нём реалистичный жизненный опыт. В игре очень много свободы, она позволяет почувствовать себя настоящим мерзавцем, Робин Гудом или праведником со стволом. А красивейшие декорации проработанного и богатого на детали открытого мира способны погрузить в себя на десятки переполненных драматичными, жестокими и забавными событиями часов.

72506148.review:
这游戏哪都好，就是不太像个游戏。个人感觉第一章作为教程章其实有些劝退，但是如果能适应整体偏慢的节奏到第二章，在新鲜感过了之前游戏体验还是相当不错的。
整个世界的生态、细节做的十分到位，70多个小时其实我才刚刚到第三章不久，我打猎、钓鱼、打牌、看风景、抢劫，一边看城里让人无语的节目表演一边跟朋友吐槽，玩的十分开心。
但是过程中我意识到游戏的收集要素太多太杂，很多东西就算看着攻略图去做都很难而且过于花时间了，想不看地图完全靠自己做完更是不可能，最后选择了做一些自己认为比较重要的，做了10个石刻的任务，开了东部传说背包，做了山狮马鞍还有自己喜欢的两套衣服，做这些花的时间也看了很多风景，中间过程也算开心。但是做完这些以后呢，干什么好呢？不做100%完成度，其它收集就完全随缘了 。而且故事模式的钱真的多的用不完，没必要刻意去抢劫刷钱。那么继续做主线？三分之一时间骑马，三分之一时间看剧情，三分之一时间瞄头么，我知道剧情还没到高峰，但是目前确实没有继续做下去的动力了。
作为一个开放世界游戏，任务中不能自由存档，但是自动存档有时表现又很智障，自由活动的时候为了防止意外需要经常性的存档，但是又没有快速存档。
游戏的细节确实到位，但是我认为过于追求细节和真实性，已经在一定程度上牺牲了游戏性，按键过于繁杂但是感觉并没有这种必要，好在游戏的按键提示很到位，还有一些设定感觉已经是故意恶心人了。营地里不能骑马我可以理解，但是为什么我在营地里连跑都不能？自己拿不下那么多武器，平时放在马身上，需要再拿这可以理解，但是为什么骑一小会就要自动放回去，有些时候在路上频繁的上马下马，自动收武器的体验真的很差。
以后缓过劲可能会找时间把主线打完，但是目前，真是感觉索然无味了。。。。。。

72476471.review:
我是个玩游戏从来不玩第二遍的人。
玩一遍把该记得的场景，那些或感人或心碎的片段，我会一一铭刻在心里。
玩过R星的GTA5还有大表哥2，不得不说R星的游戏好像一本书，一部电影。
他会慢慢把人物的性格，故事的内容，世界的全貌娓娓道来，慢慢讲给你听，令人沉醉其中，不能自拔。
游戏的前半段，我看着亚瑟为帮派做事，见到形形色色的人，甚至帮助在路边素不相识的陌生人。
慢慢的好像我在虚拟的世界多了一位叫亚瑟的朋友。
你可以一个星期不去见他，但只要上线，他总在那，或倚靠这路灯，或坐在大树下，似乎在等着你。
说实话，看到亚瑟被麦卡背叛，被达奇不信任，到最后丢掉了性命。我玩的真的很难受，有点生气，也有点伤心。
后面就操控这约翰，一心想为亚瑟复仇。在子弹打入麦卡胸口的时候，我的内心很平静。
仇报了，故事，也要结束了。
再见亚瑟，就算他们都忘了你。我也会记得，在那狂野的西部，曾有一个像风一样的牛仔。

72429718.review:
I think in a lot of ways the game is a straight upgrade over the original. I loved the story and characters and while most missions boil down to pretty basic shooting gallery gameplay it's still solid fun.

Some things that bothered me was some achievements can be missed if you don't do certain optional tasks in each camp. Horses are a pain and I find myself being pulled into trees by the AI or tripping over rocks far too often. I even got soft-locked a couple of times when my horse began to refuse accepting input.

The Fast Travel System isn't great, forcing you to choose from a menu rather than letting you just use the map like most games. Shopping catalogues are slow and makes buying things a pain.

Complaints aside, I had a good time.

72426977.review:
I now realise why gta6 hasnt come sooner and ill never complain again about it cause rockstar has outdone themselves with this game. I really really hope we get a read dead 3 because quite honestly this is even better than gta5 and i dont even like westerns or have any interest in that kind of stuff. 

The graphics are INSANE. yes you have to have a beast pc to run this at ultra settings but if you do have a high end pc then this game is worth the price alone just to walk through saint denis at night with the HUD off and just let your jaw hit the floor at what is possible in graphic quality. the volumetric lighting, the asmr worthy sound design, its an experience i wont forget. 

not to mention value for money but im 40 hours into the game and i still havent finished the main storyline. after all sidemissions etc im guessing this is a 100 hour + game and thats worth the price tag in my book. 

long story short, buy this masterpiece. if you have a high end pc you owe it to yourself to buy this just to push your gpu to its limits and see what is possible in a game. 

10/10

72765480.review:
***Single Player Review Only***

Controversial Summary: Red Dead Redemption 2 (RDR2) is a boring game. It's like covering a moldy fruit cake in fondant and calling it a work of art. Sure it looks pretty, but the core is past it's prime and an unbearable mess.

1. Slow Start
The game starts of at a slow pace in the tutorial section, which for me at least wasn't the major issue. For some people this slow start will already be a major stumbling block. Provided you can get into the story this shouldn't be an insurmountable obstacle. 

2. Repititive, boring, missions
The main quest line begins strong with a variety of situations and scenarios, but by chapter 4 of 6 the underlying tedium becomes unbearable. Most quests follow a formula of 'Follow NPC on your horse while listening to dialogue, spend 2 min at location, everything goes wrong, proceed to shoot your way out of there'. This same formula is repeated OVER AND OVER AND OVER again from the very first town you enter.

3. Gated content
RDR2 is touted as this wonderful open world game in which you can freely explore this beutiful world around you. The issue is much of the game is constantly gated behind story progressions. I understand gating of certain areas, and of course gating of side quests, but when guns are gated for no apparent reason, it becomes increasingly frustrating. 
The most frustrating aspect of this is that for hunting you need to use a certain type of weapon in order to secure a high quality pelt, Problem is these guns are locked until later parts of the game. This often makes you feel like you're in a pretty world, but one you can only view through glass.

 
4. Deviations from the formula are somehow worse
You know what's worse than doing the same thing over and over again? Doing a worse version of it. A great example is the pointless quest where you empty some crawfish traps in the swamp. Let's ever so slowly wade through water at night by lamp light. Not only is the movement clunky and boring, you don't even have the scenery to distract you.

5. Inconsistent game logic
The game has bars of health/stamina/focus. Often times in missions the stamina bar will be incostintently impacted. Try to swim 10 feet out of a mission? You'll run out of stamina and die, but somehow you can swim to shore from a mission boat, no  problem or wade through a swamp.
You have a 50-50 in any given mission of your horse behaving how you'd expect it to in terms of follow/stay
The focus meter for deadeye will often fail to refill, even with a full core, taking a potion seems to be the only way to fix this bug
The physics mean that sometimes your horse stops on a small rock, sometimes it jumps, and sometimes you go flying and possibly die.
6. Controls
Clunky, inconsistent interactions with the game world. It feels like any shoot out needs Mouse and Keyboard, but literally everything else in the game needs a controller. Turning, walking, moving at any speed on foot that isn't miserable, jumping on your horse, stopping on your horse, swimming, aiming, shooting, reloading, using throwables etc. are all areas the game has trouble with. If you are thinking that sounds like the whole game, then you can imagine why the controls are a weakness for this game.

7. Unnecesary 'Realism'
I get it, skinning a bison isn't instant, and picking a flower doesn't happen immediately. But it's 2020. As a society we've come to the conclusion that no one wants to be subjected to hours of plant picking and rat skinning. Often times I spend as much time walking over and skinning an animal as actually hunting it, even for legendary beasts. Do I really need to sit here for 10 min indivudally cooking each piece of meat? Does it add anything to the gameplay after the first 10 times? 

The common argument is 'IMMERSION' but here's the deal, interacting with the gameworld is immersive. Watching someone perform the same action over and over is not interactive nor anything but a needless time sink.

__________________________________

So now that we've gotten some of the negatives out of the way, I would normally mention the positives. There are many in this game but I think you can learn those from other reviews. What I want to call out that I don't often see mentioned are the random encounters.

This game seems to shine when it finally allows the player some agency and let's the player determine the course of action the way you can in many of the stranger encounters and side quests. When the game is focused on 'telling a story' it becomes bogged down in exposition and tedium ridden gameplay that distracts from the story at hand. However when the game puts forth a scenario and allows you to discover it unfold in a free from it becomes much more immersive and enjoyable.

Also, obligatory, game looks pretty.

72451728.review:
Red Dead Redemption 2 is an absolute masterpiece of a game. I have put countless hours on this game with my PS4. Single-player is incredible. Haven't really played online so I can't say for sure on how that plays. 

My main issue with this PC release of Red Dead Redemption 2 is with the Rockstar Club Launcher. I wanted to replay the game again but I actually can't even start the game. Why? Because my steam account is tied to an old social club account with a deleted email. I created a different social club account with a new email I use now in order to play the game but that does not work. Why? Because the Rockstar Launcher will only launch the game with your old account. Meaning that you can't use multiple accounts or play on offline mode. YOU CANNOT PLAY OFFLINE BECAUSE THE ROCKSTAR CLUB LAUNCHER IS DRM. I tried and it just does not work. Your steam profile is tied directly to that one account only. It's such an incredible hassle to begin with. I contacted Rockstar customer support in order to link my steam profile with my new social club account. They couldn't do it. They needed my old social club account with the deleted email from a long time ago in order to play, even though I explained it to them. I tried recovering the deleted email from google but that doesn't work because I forgot the details to recover the account. Whoops my bad for an email I used such a long time ago and never gave much thought to. I'm definitely sure I'm not the only one with this issue but Rockstar Customer support seems fairly incompetent to figure out a way to fix this. I have had a similar issue with a different company. Ubisoft. I couldn't play Far Cry 3 since I had an old Uplay account with a deleted email tied to my steam account and guess what? THEY ACTUALLY HELPED OUT AND WERE ABLE TO LINK MY NEW ACCOUNT WITH MY STEAM PROFILE SO THAT I CAN ACTUALLY PLAY THE GAME. I don't even like Uplay as a launcher to begin with but at least their customer support was actually helpful compared to Rockstar's customer support. That's really saying something when Uplay is a better service than the Rockstar Club Launcher. 

If you want to understand why so many people have problems with companies putting DRM into their games with these launchers, this is a good reason why! It's restrictive and unnecessary. I'm glad that other people are able to play this game on PC but how about other people like me that face similar issues with the Rockstar Club Launcher? Well I guess Rockstar just told us to go screw ourselves. It makes me incredibly mad because this shouldn't even be a problem to begin with. You shouldn't need a launcher that monitors your internet connection in order to play a single player mode! 

That's all I have to say. If anyone can help me out in order to play this game on PC, I will gladly take down this negative review. But until then, I see no other way around it to actually play the game so I refunded it. I will not be supporting Rockstar Games on PC anymore with Steam. Also if you think about it, GTA 6 will most likely have to use the Rockstar Club Launcher too. If it ever comes out. So is this the future of Rockstar game releases on Steam? If so, no thanks. I don't want any part of it. I would rather play it on a console without the intrusive Rockstar Launcher, so that I can actually play the game. At this point, I'm very hesitant to support Rockstar games with my money going forward and you should consider not supporting them too.   

Also unrelated side-note: Rockstar is incredibly stupid for re-releasing GTA 5 on the PS5. Really dropped the ball on that one.

73566856.review:
I wish Steam let you recommend Story/Single Player modes or Online/Multiplayer modes. I DO recommend the Story. I don't recommend buying this for RDR Online.

In the STORY -
The graphics are excellent, the scenes are beautiful and the character interactions are great. The dialogue is a little bit goofy /sometimes/ but mostly it flows very well and tells a good story. It's kind of like a playable movie. The story is done in a way that makes you get involved emotionally and care when characters die or betray the group. Play the story slowly, really take your time. There are so many small things you can do and get caught up in that make this worth playing over and over again. 
The choices you make change the world around Arthur. I've found it engaging and honestly, it's well worth the time to simply wander to see what you can find. 

For ONLINE - 
Play it for a while. It's entertaining until it isn't. Once you complete the story and paid content quest lines, it becomes a super over done hunting game. Hunting is your main source of income after story lines are done with so you'll be riding around searching for animals to kill and sell at the butcher. Animals which in Story mode are abundant, are few and far between Online. It's like R* forgot to up the spawn rate to account for 25 people playing in the same map instead of just one player(Story Mode). 
The extra content is a money grab. The Trader is hunting, the Naturalist is hunting.... Remember how hunting is your main income anyway? So you're going to hunt for yourself, and for the Trader and Naturalist. Moonshine almost never works, but when it does it's basically bandit camps and driving a cart(also part of Trader). Madam Nazar(Collector) is kinda fun, but also tedious. It's basically hunting for things instead of animals. 
All of that said, the amount of customization you can apply to your online character, guns, horse and camp is pretty cool. RDRO is worth playing until you're bored with it, just know that it falls very short of Story Mode.

73949745.review:
[h1] Reseña general [/h1]
Realmente vale la pena comprar este juego y es casi imposible en votar negativo en esta obra maestra, por su extensa historia bien desarrollada te encariñas de los personajes como por ejemplo Arthur Morgan y verlo en la forma en que muere llorarás como un "bebe" xd. Me tardó aproximadamente 62Hrs en pasarme el juego (Incluyendo algunas misiones secundarias). La banda sonora que tiene es buena en todos los aspectos, guiones extensos y se ve el fruto de $644.2 milliones de dolares invertidos al juego. Los personajes secundarios y tambien a los que literalmente no aporta nada a la mision secundaria o principal tienen cada uno tiene su propia historia y las misiones secuncarias son bastantes vareadas e inesperadas, tanto como sencilla o talvez complicada todo depende con quien te encuentres y donde vayas, al pasear a lo largo del mapa te encontrarás con eventos aleatorios o quizás de salvar a alguien de la muerte y cada parte del mapa esta llenas de misterios como por ejemplo "El tren fantasma" (Lo encontre de manera inesperada xd). Le recomiendo mejor compar la version standard ya que la "Special edition", solo trae dos misiones que solo lo puedes hacer en un tiempo en especifico (Según yo iba a estar ahi de forma permanente pero no lo hice y nunca más lo volvi a ver xd)

[h1] Jugabilidad [/h1]
Tiene una buena jugabilidad, pero aveces puede ser algo complicado en ciertas partes cuando montas a caballo (Si te quedas atorado entre arboles tendras que reiniciar la mision ya que no hay forma de volver atrás xd), en el punto de la mira o estabilidad en puntado, es bastante realista aveces puedes apuntar sin ningun problema pero cuando disparas consecutivamente pierdes notablemente la punteria y las propiedades de la vida del personaje a la hora de probar ciertos alimentos puede cambiar notablemente la vida, con esos detalles hace grande el juego.

[h1] Detalles Del Juego [/h1]
Esta bien detallado los NPCs haciendo que si tuvieran vida propia o una propia historia detras de cada personaje literalmente que solo veas una vez y despues de ahí no lo vuelvas a ver (Un poco exagerado pero bueno xd) habían hecho un video la vida diaria de un NPC que casi ningun juego lo han hecho como por ejemplo: Salir de casa y trabajar pasar tiempo con los amigos y al ocultarse el sol volver a la casa hasta un nuevo día (Eso depende del NPC que sigas), los animales estan bien detallados tanto en como se comportan y como se mueven o atacan (Como por ejemplo los animales acercandose a sus compañeros ya muertos y se quedan ahí esperando x,d), tambien hechos curiosos como un hombre desnudo comiendo carne de animales muertos en la noche intento acercarme pero algun animal me termina atacando y lo pierdo (Lo he encontrado en zonas boscosas).

[h1] Mundo [/h1]
Bastante grande y misterios que quizás no se han resuelto a día de hoy despues de su lanzamiento (Como por ejemplo el modelo de una personaje que originalmente es una "leyenda urbana", pero al tener el modelo en los archivos del juego quizás habra una forma de averiguarlo o encontrar la mision de ella), y tambien el misterio de GAVIN, hay muchas dudas con ese personaje pero a día de hoy no hay una explicacion de quien sea. Hay lugares debastados con curiosidad de explorar de principio a fin y en aspecto del clima realmente no hay mucho en que destacar funciona igual que los demas juegos (Aveces hay tormenta de rayos pero solo sucede en las misiones secundarias en especifico).

[h1] Bugs, Glitches o Errores [/h1]
El juego cuenta con un catalogo extenso a que tengas errores de todo tipo y bueno me he tomado la tarea de tomar todo lo que pude xd (No tiene spoilers)

73656564.review: One of the best games i've ever played alongside with the first Red Dead Redemption. Yes, the prologue can be little long and meditative but the pacing transition and the game world as a whole is what makes it shine. The game expects you to take a slow approach: It has long horse riding activities, long looting animations, long hunting sessions etc. It literally invites you to stop for a moment, make a camp, enjoy a cup of coffee or two and watch a beautiful sunset or sunrise. You can take a horse ride through the country and safely get here without any accidents. But it's also an 50/50 chance that in a blink of the eye simple horse riding from A to B will turn into your own little epic adventure with shooting,explosions, helping crazy strangers out, saving people from animals etc.. Or you can just meet a friendly feller on the road which invites you to warm yourself up near his campfire and share with you some of his stories. The stories...Yes. Which make your camp atmosphere so special. The game has so many activities, dialogues, animations in your gang hideout which are of course absolutely unnecessary and can be igored either by intention or by accident. But when you actually start to absorb these stories, listen to the folks arguing, interacting with each other, interacting with you. Well, this handcrafted content makes these NPCs alive — you're no longer in a company of dummies, you're with your friends,family. That kind of pacing makes this story special. Bravo to Rockstar. And  praise the legends of the East and West.

72480955.review:
This game is a representation of effort. The effort put in by the developers, the effort put in by the characters, and to a lesser extent, the effort it can take to learn the game and master its mechanics.

Its mechanics are not complicated, but it is possible to get exceptionally good at them. The amount of time it takes to complete this game and complete the side missions works exclusively to its advantage, as you learn more of how to play and how to play better, fighting the enemies with ever more accomplishment and enjoyment. It doesn't get harder, it gets more interesting.

The developers must have put an immense amount of effort into the game. It's well optimized, its mechanics are excellent, and the breadth of the mechanics and the quality of its story is a testament to the skill of its developers and the work they put into it.

And finally, the characters are brilliant. Arthur Morgan is an outlaw of the highest degree, stealing, killing, and looting with an efficiency that makes him seem more formidable than most voiceless FPS protagonists or RPG main characters. This, combined with the enjoyability and realism in the other members of the gang, and the skillful usage of tone shifts and general emotion make the game enjoyable from start to finish.


In short, get it. It's great.

Eu estou adorando o jogo, más como disse, se não tem paciência com bugs é melhor utilizar seu dinheiro em outro jogo, mesmo Red Dead 2 sendo tão bom como é, eu não quero para a minha consciência saber que alguém comprou pq eu dei uma nota positiva só falando que o jogo é lindo e depois de jogar algumas horas a pessoa se arrepende pq não aguentou tanto bug.

73304618.review:
游戏85分，如果有额外打分功能，我想给R星平台打个0分，打开等半年不说，只不过一段时间没有登录居然就登不上去了，最后去贴吧找了删文件夹的法子才弄好。游戏是好游戏无疑，各种细节十分充实，亡命之徒的生活也让人沉浸其中，就是一些小功能还让人不甚满意——比如快速旅行还要记住地名，比如莫名其妙掉荣誉，比如中期开始就完全没用的钱。钱花不出去是我几个朋友都吐槽这游戏的一点，拿命换来的美金居然完全没有消费渠道，这是让人很有挫败感的。是不是可以像某5，你可以花钱盘个酒馆啊，牧场什么的呢？或许制作组觉得那样人物就不是亡命之徒，变成资本家了吧。

此外想吐槽一下关于这游戏的结局——以下是通关之后的个人感受，内涵毫不含蓄的结局剧透，还没通关的朋友千万不要点开。

[spoiler]剧情流程给我一种感觉，制作组游戏做到一半了忽然决定让达奇做坏人。因为达奇坏得很突兀，一开始还是个挺有人格魅力的队伍首领，后面忽然开始出昏招，不负责任，站队小人。要说迈卡坏是从他第一个任务就体现出来的话，达奇的黑化得就很生硬，几个明显有问题的决定明显不符合他一贯的人设。如果说约翰被关在监狱不去营救还是为了大局着想，不想招惹更多警察的目光，那么抢劫火车任务约翰中枪故意不去救治就完全不合常理了。仿佛剧本是为黑而黑，为了让他当坏人而这么做。而最终决战他一枪崩了迈卡更是让人摸不着头脑——亚瑟指责迈卡是叛徒，他站队迈卡；亚瑟和迈卡决战，他依然站队迈卡。但是，当约翰质问他的时候，他却把迈卡干掉了。最后，从游戏一开始就念叨钱的达奇把巨款留下，自己一个人走了。可以说，他一连串的决定完全不合逻辑。我朋友说，达奇那么在乎钱，是为了让大家都能走，最后队伍散了，自然也就不需要钱了。有一定的道理，但至少我玩的时候依然带着一脸黑人问号。

个人觉得，迈卡出卖队伍给警察，警察围攻营地，亚瑟摩根殿后掩护大家撤退战死，最终决战是约翰杀死迈卡复仇——这样的剧本会让我更舒服。或许制作组觉得这样的剧情俗套，想制造一些意想不到的效果。但个人看来这个剧本比较糟糕，至少让人觉得有些刻意。达奇作为领导者，面对队伍分裂不去想办法弥合，而是旗帜鲜明的摆出立场，支持其中一边，这无疑会增加团伙的撕裂。或许有人会说，达奇就是个土匪头子，你不能对他要求太高。但走过剧情的朋友们都能在日常对话中感觉到，达奇有多么在意大家，他在意队伍里每一个人，希望大家都能离开这里，前往幸福的理想乡。剧情一开始达奇也表现出足够领导队伍的能力，是个很有本事的家伙。就是这种前后的反差，给玩家一种落差感，如此在意兄弟的达奇，随随便便就把忠心耿耿的手下放弃掉了——甚至还不是什么生死攸关的时候，甚至完全换不来什么。总之这个觉得转变得太扯，希望后续的作品不要出现这种情况。当然，以上只是个人的一些看法，仅供大家参考[/spoiler]

73123159.review:
[h1] «Внутри тебя есть хороший человек… но он борется с великаном» [/h1]

Буквально только что закончил сюжетную кампанию этой великолепной игры, поэтому мне есть что сказать на этот счёт. Хорошая ли игра? Безусловно! Является ли она «шедевром», коим многие привыкли её называть? И да, и нет, и в этом обзоре вы узнаете, почему именно.

Скажу сразу, что в этом обзоре будет рассказано не столько о положительных моментах данной игры, сколько об отрицательных, так как лично я всегда предпочитаю узнать у человека, будь то обсуждение фильма, игры, статьи или чего-то ещё, что ИМЕННО ему не понравилось в данном произведении (тем более если в конце концов у него сложилось негативное впечатление). 

Так вот, если вы читаете этот обзор, размышляя, стоит ли брать игру или нет (а это значит, что вы, скорее всего, уже посмотрели трейлер, возможно какое-то геймплей-видео или что-то ещё), то вы наверняка уже итак всё знаете о безупречной графической составляющей игры, о чём я хочу поговорить меньше всего, как раз-таки потому что спорить с тем, что игра красива, просто бессмысленно. Пейзажи, погода, гипер-реалистичные облака и небо – здесь МАКСИМАЛЬНОЕ попадание в точку от Рокстар (хотя тот же Ведьмак 3, как по мне, в этом плане лучше, но там всё-таки фэнтези-вселенная, потому и очень сочная, контрастная картинка, как в некой сказке). 

Детализация мира тоже на уровне. Кроме основного сюжета в игре присутствуют и второстепенные миссии (в частности, случайные события и миссии от незнакомцев, которые тоже развиваются по своим собственным  веткам в процессе прохождения), однако, как по мне, постепенно они наскучивают и становятся однообразными (помоги тому, помоги другому, сходи убей/укради/принеси и всё в этом духе), поэтому надолго они вас не задержат, из за чего вы будете переходить уже на ОСНОВНОЙ СЮЖЕТ, к которому у меня, к сожалению, очень много претензий.

Итак, [u] СЮЖЕТ [/u].

Трудно, конечно, сказать что-то конкретное, не проспойлерив при этом ключевые моменты в игре, но скажу одно: redemption (что на русском значит ИСКУПЛЕНИЕ и стоит третьим словом в названии игры) идёт только до 6 главы включительно, и то лишь В ТОМ СЛУЧАЕ, если вы будете хорошим человеком (да-да, в игре есть карма, которая меняется в зависимости от ваших поступков и влияет на концовку игры). ТОЛЬКО ТОГДА главный герой, в конце концов, совершит то самое redemption (очищение, искупление своей души). Если вы всё-таки решитесь пройти эту игру, то сами всё прочувствуете и поймёте своей головой, я не буду пытаться донести до вас то, что просто так убивать NPC (по фану, как в гта) не стоит, так как каждое убийство ложится не только на игрока, как в гта, но и на вашего персонажа, что в итоге повлияет на его мировоззрение и концовку в том числе (хотя и не так сильно, как в том же Ведьмаке, ну да ладно).

Так вот, вы спросите, наверное: «А что после этой самой 6 главы»? Знаете, я и сам не совсем понял, что)). Хотя нет, конечно же понял, но не могу вам сказать, так как каждое моё слово будет жалящим сердце спойлером. Я считаю, что последние 2 главы у игры (7 и 8 соответственно) просто плохие. И плохие они не столько сюжетом, сколько обилием идиотских и глупых тир-миссий, которые, конечно, были и в предыдущих главах, но здесь, в эпилоге, они НЕ НУЖНЫ. Совсем. Понятно, что Рокстар хотели в первую очередь показать, насколько важным было то самое искупления Артура (главного героя первых 6 глав), и как его поступки повлияли на семью Джона Марстона (героя последних 2 глав). Но зачем… скажите, зачем столько стрельбы? Извините, но перестрелок здесь СЛИШКОМ много, и это главный минус этой игры. Понятно, что Wild West есть Wild West, но слишком уж эта пальба долгая и нереалистичная (ну не могут двое-трое человек раскидать ЦЕЛЫЙ ГОРОД, сами подумайте :D:D). 

Поэтому не обессудьте, друзья.

В остальном предъяв к игре нет, в онлайн, если честно, почти не играл, да и не интересен он мне (хотя многие жалуются, что Рокстар забили на контент и обновления в целом, а игроки байкотируют, одеваясь в клоунов. Забавно :D).

Рекомендую ли я эту игру? В общем и целом да, рекомендую, ведь такие детализированные игры выходят очень редко, раз в несколько лет! Поэтому покупайте и наслаждайтесь, ребята)

Ставлю игре [b] 8.5 goddamn train’ов из 10 [/b], спасибо за то, что выслушали 😉

73024050.review:
The game looks amazing and it's immersive beyond anything I've ever played. The world is so alive and realistic. You are instantly bounding with the characters and lines are written so fu**ing well! Voice acting is top noch too. 

Okay so why the thumb down? Well let me explain. Gameplay is extremely poor in this game. I don't know how the devs managed to create such a detailed and fantastic looking world and yet failed in gameplay mechanics so badly. The controls are extremely clunky, picking items are pain in the ass, combat is boring and there is no feeling of a character progression. Missions are ALL THE SAME!! They look different but what you do is basically the same thing over and over and over. Start at point A, follow the road given in the minimap, arrive to point B, take cover and shoot. That is it! Thats all you do during the entire game. 

There is no space for freedom in an open world game! You must follow the misson in the way that the game wants you to do. I will give you one example. In one of the bounty hunting missions you confront with a guy who says he changed. He is with his wife and kid and he teaches his son how to ride a horse. The guy says hey I won't resist, you can just hand me to the law. At that point I wanted to let the guy go and not to turn him in. The game doesn't let you! Mission fails if you don't catch him and tie him up. You must hand him over to the police there is no alternative! That was not a main story mission, it was just a side quest. There are thounds of instanses where you can't alter the scripted gameplay at all. 

Story is nice and everything but I want freedom in an open world game. That is kind of the idea to make an open world game right? NO. I finished the game and enjoyed the story but this is supposed to be a game not a tv series.

73304373.review: Coming from having played a whole slew of open world RPG games, this is hands down one of the best and most beautiful games I've ever played. You are constantly in awe of your surroundings and the freedom to do just about anything you'd ever imagine. Right from the get go the world sucks you in so easily, and time passes so quickly. You want to play and keep playing. You forget about sleep. You keep wanting to see what Arthur gets up to next. Whether it be hunting down a big fat boar, robbing a gun store, blowing up a bridge, killing rival gangs, rescuing someone who got bitten by a snake, helping a family build a house so they could then sell it, landing in jail because you accidentally ran over someone with your horse, really, the list is endless. The attention to detail is second to none. Even 2 years after its release, people are still finding new undiscovered things in this game, even after multiple playthroughs. This game is storytelling at its absolute best. The countless raving reviews all sing the same tune - buy it, live it! RIDE WITH ME!

72538741.review:
I bought this game because I thought it was going to be really polished. The single player might be good but I bought this for the online mode, so my review focuses on multiplayer.

The first thing you should know is you should use a VPN when you play this game, because it exposes your IP address to other players who can easily link it back to you personally and do things like try to hack your personal computer or find out where you live.

Cheating is a huge issue in this game. Half of the time you join a game some cheater will instantly start blowing you up from halfway across the map. If you don't immediately get griefed, you will often run into cheaters using god mode in the minigames. It's frustrating because this game is great when you're playing with legitimate players... but a hacker can strike at any time and when they do the game is always ruined. It's not unusual to have your pelts disappear out of your hands right after skinning (stolen by a modder), or to have a modder change the upkeep rate to maliciously drain the money from everyone in the server.

Thumbs down to Rockstar doing nothing about cheating in any of their games which otherwise have so much potential. The game is extremely fun and enjoyable when it's working as intended. I recommend the game aside from Rockstar doing nothing about hackers in multiplayer.

The game is fun but the glitches and hackers in the online mode are pretty annoying. This game clearly needs an update to counter griefing by modders and hackers.

73583593.review: Probably my top 3 favorite games of all time (When it works, but don't let that discourage you). It has such a long yet compelling story and the ending made me cry for a week. It is so realistic but in a very unique way, you do have to eat to keep your weight up and not eat too much or you'll be overweight. But it isn't like most games like that where if you don't eat every few minutes you die and you have to start the entire game over or anything. The cores system is something I never thought of but it makes so much sense and I could go on and on about all the gameplay mechanics that make this game so fun but I really shouldn't. There is so much to do outside of the main story and it reminds me something of Breath of the Wild. You can fill out a compendium by studying Animals, Fish, Horses, Equipment, Gangs, Plants, Cigarette Cards, and you can even do fun challenges like robbing trains without dying or being caught, finding lots of treasure, win a poker game, season and cook some game, try not to get bucked off of a wild horse, try and kill some legendary animals, shoot a bird out of the sky, fish, kill a bear with knives, and of course SO SO MUCH MORE!!! You can find strangers and help them with tasks, take down the 6 evil gangs, obtain fashionable outfits, tame a white Arabian horse in the snow, become a pirate. Don't even get me started on Online, yes the people can be unforgiving little shits but Online mode is almost an entirely different game being updated every few months, which is really impressive for a game that came out almost 2 years ago now. I know I haven't scratched the surface of this game yet but I am loving every second of it... Except Micah... BUY THIS GAME NOW YOU SERIOUSLY WONT REGRET IT!!! Or maybe wait for it to go on sale. It's an enormous game that will keep you entertained for months, at least that's what it's doing for others and I wont lose interest any time soon.

73582624.review:
Amazing single player, same old Rockstar formula, but if you liked GTA V's mission structure, it is very similar. The characters are what makes this game, so if GTA's character development left something to be desired, here every single member of your gang is fleshed out if you spend some time listening to their dialogue on missions or in camp. 

Online leaves quite a bit to be desired, but can be either a nice calm time sink while hunting, traveling, or hanging out with friends, or you can be a gun-toting action packed cowboy/bounty hunter. Very wide breadth  of things to do, but the depth of each could leaves some activities feeling hollow.

72769822.review:
I've been playing a lot of online early access games. Nothing else seems to be on the market that is new and upcoming that isn't from a notable game developer.  It is a breath of fresh air actually playing a real AAA quality game again. Fluid movements, smooth combat. Decent size map that doesn't seem like empty scenery. Convincing ai and npcs. Weather effects, graphics and the small little details that are numerous, that further adds to your immersion. Not surprised to have all this in a R* game. I'd be surprised if that R* game didn't have all that level of detail and game design. 

It's just a shame that even with all this quality game design and level of detail, the game seems so damn dead online. And unlike early access games, its definitely not because the game is bad, or poorly designed, or seems unfinished. Its definitely not because the game is clunky and has a lot of optimization problems or crashes a lot. And its definitely not because the game is being developed by incompetent swine for developers. Fortunately, none of these game killer scenarios are what is affecting RDO.

In my opinion, there is only thing that is wrong with RDO: It starts out fun and enjoyable, but becomes very boring very quickly because there is nothing to do. Yes we have the role missions, but all of them get very boring very fast after awhile. The online needs more content R*. 

I'll still keep playing because the game is really good and can become fun again. And I'd definitely recommend it. But buyer beware: It doesn't have much content in the online mode.

73436215.review:
Ещё не завершил вторую главу, а эта игра меня уже успела задолбать. Сюжет хорош, атмосфера хороша, а вот техническая составляющая ПРОСТО ОТВРАТИТЕЛЬНА. Началось всё с того, что игра полностью игнорировала мои попытки выставить нужный монитор (коих у меня два) и нужное разрешение, с каждым новым запуском сбрасывая настройки (Пофиксил, кстати, выбором оконного режима и выставлением окна без рамки через Borderless Gaming). [b]UPD 04.08.2020: Не пофиксил. Эту хрень невозможно пофиксить, я думаю.[/b] Продолжилось тем, что у меня пропала DLC-шная лошадь. Просто взяла и пропала. Вместе с седлом и уровнем доверия, который я так долго набивал. Вместо неё появилась стандартная теннесийская лошадь, которая была выбрана в качестве альтернативной (Пофиксил я это путём подрыва оставшихся лошадей динамитом и выжиданием автосейва (спасибо парням с реддита, которые детально расписали способ решения данной проблемы). После этого в конюшне в Валентайне снова заспавнилась DLC-шная лошадь) И закончилось, на данный момент, тем, что во время очередной игры в покер произошёл вылет со знаменитейшей (как я понимаю) ошибкой ERR_GFX_STATE. Складывается такое впечатление, что над игрой работал однорукий калека, который просто портировал игру с консоли и забил на так необходимые в подобных случаях доработки напильником. 

З.Ы. За нажимающиеся пункты в настройках разрабам приготовлен отдельный котел (ибо после каждого такого нажатия выскакивает окно с предложением сохранить настройки, что ОЧЕНЬ СИЛЬНО БЕСИТ).

З.З.Ы. Я постараюсь пройти эту игру и дополнить обзор более объективной точкой зрения, но чувствую, что ещё несколько таких приколов, и я дропну её.

[b]UPD 04.08.2020: Не постараюсь. У меня второй раз пропала лошадь с четвертым уровнем доверия и дважды завис оверлей стима поверх игры. Спасибо, Рокстары. Классный продукт.[/b]

73042632.review:
Singleplayer: WOULD RECOMMEND
Multiplayer: NOT RECOMMENDED - HACKERS

Singleplayer is absolutely incredible! Human and endearing characters, interesting quests/scenarios, and an immersive world to explore!

Multiplayer is not. The premise is good, but I played for 7 days this past week. Of those 7 days, 4 of them had hackers. 

I repeat: 57% of my games had hackers.

It's VERY hard to complete online missions when hackers are ruining your game. If you enjoy:
1. Being blown up repeatedly out of nowhere 
2. Being teleported with everyone else to a part of the map for you and your horse to be killed
3. Having bears teleported on top of you to kill you

Then this game is for you! Go right ahead. If instead you enjoy:
1. Playing as gunslingers and desperados alone or with your friends
2. Hunting rare animals
3. Enjoying incredibly scenic vistas and locales

Then honestly, either just play singleplayer, or find another game. You'll be interrupted by hackers way too frequently for you to be able to accomplish anything. And no, there are no private servers. There are methods of glitching into a private session, but you can't complete story missions in them and need other people to do it.

Considering GTA still has hackers that are using fairly similar hacking tools, I have little hope that Rockstar will ever fix this. You have the ability to report other players, but given the nature of the hacks, it's often incredibly difficult to tell who's doing it in your lobby, making it kind of useless.

72591691.review:
Probably the best bang-for-my-buck game that I bought in recent memory, even at full price. This is what some 8 years of development and rolling in enough money from GTA to allow for overindulgence looks like, ladies. The story is a typical tear jerker that one would kinda expect from a Red Dead title, the world is sprawling and alive with NPCs and wildlife, the shooting mechanics feel heavy and satisfying and everything in polished in spectacular animations.

Infact, there can be too much of a good thing, and that's the aforementioned overindulgence on the developers part. Your character packs up, aims, reloads, rides, walks, runs, etc. with such level of detail that it often comes at a detriment to gameplay - every corpse is body searched, every animal is skinned in such detail that I can probably open up my own butcher shop right about now, which is excellent except when you're seeing it for the 200th time. Your character's movements have weight and inertia that makes it feel sluggish, so often times you'll do this weird foot shuffle routine trying to pick up items or interact with the environment. 

The missions themselves are your standard GTA fare, which means if you played any GTA game since forever, you can probably guess how Grand Theft Horse is gonna go. Follow this, fetch that, shit inevitably goes wrong, shoot that. It's very railroaded in an otherwise extremely sandbox game, and while I can understand there is an intriguing story to tell with a focused experience, the approach to some missions doesn't allow for any straying off the beaten path or alternative approaches.

Performance wise, I didn't have any issues starting up or running this game and I got it right at the start during release, when it was mostly bombed for performance issues. Then again I'm not running it on a toaster PC or from parts obtained from an underground Indonesian tattoo parlor - so your results may vary.

Overall, if you're into an epic storyline and a really immersive wild west game, I can definitely recommend RDR2, unless you're ADHD to the point where you need to shoot or set something ablaze every walking moment in a high pitched, snappy action, to get your adrenaline going and keep your pitch black heart still pumping.

Also, the real villain of the story is Abigail. It's a story of a man who goes from having epic adventures with his bromance buddies, to being chained down to a home with a nagging wife who's face you have to wake up to every morning. Truly a tragedy where the sweet release of death only happens at the end of RDR1.

72934182.review:
首先表明，我是R星忠实粉 
自我碰上电脑并玩上了罪恶都市的那一刻起，我就爱上了这一系列的游戏和游戏背后的公司
无论R星或者他旗下的游戏遭到如何的谩骂，我仍旧会给这个公司点赞

荒野大镖客2不仅继承了前作的优点更是集成了R星到目前为止的所有技术与能力，毫不夸张的说，这游戏比我见过的R星其他作品都要更加优秀
1.首先仍旧是细腻的画质，只要你显卡配置够好，那么你一定会获得前所未有的体验
2.近乎完美的剧情，R星的剧情安排一直是首屈一指的，从亚瑟的死到约翰的复仇，见证了西部牛仔们时代的结束，也见证了R星登峰造极般的创作能力
3.极度自由的游戏风格，R星的作品大都如此，在荒野大镖客上更上一筹，有了更多的自由游戏选择，真正体会到西部风情
4.超多的游戏彩蛋，GTA5里面就有很多耳熟能详的游戏彩蛋，在荒野大镖客里面也不毫不落后，R星为玩家安排了许多彩蛋供探索，而且好多彩蛋都能引人深思
5.客观事实，这是R星一向的做事风格，在游戏里我们能看见披着长辫子的华人劳工修建铁路，能看见带着圆顶小帽的华人商贩，能看见华人店铺，亦或者听见一口清脆的福建音。是的，在美国目前仍旧怀有极大的种族歧视环境下，R星做到了正视历史，承认并感谢当初中国华人劳工为美国西部开发做出的贡献，这也是R星留给中国玩家最大的一个彩蛋
6.对各种现实的畅想与创意，这点体现在R星的各种彩蛋上面，有外星人的，有穿越时空的，有长生不老的。我十分佩服R星游戏创作者们的脑洞以及发散的思维，做游戏就得体现自己独到的风格和与众不同的体制

最后我想对差评的网友们说，任何游戏都不是完美的都是有瑕疵的，GTA5历时5年终修成正果，赢得好评，荒野大镖客2不过3年左右，如果不能耐心等待，那么你只能吃酸葡萄而不能吃甜葡萄，荒野大镖客2倾尽R星数年心血，是不会轻易放弃的。有的人会说线上模式外挂那么多，刷钱那么多R星怎么就不管呢？不是不管，而是难管，外挂一直是各界游戏的心病，想要彻底消灭外挂真的只有像鹅厂那样花大价钱线上线下整治，而R星又是国际游戏发布商，要做到恐怕难上加难，就我来说，外挂对我的游戏体验并没有影响，大部分时候都可以避开，这要得益于R星在荒野大镖客里面加入了红名体制，外挂大部分都是红名，战局里面有就可以换，而且红名玩家大部分时候都匹配的红名玩家，如果你匹配到大量的红名玩家只能说明你游戏态度不好，系统降低了你的值，大部分时候线上还是能自由快乐的玩耍的
综上所述，荒野大镖客2是我忠爱的作品之一，R星也是我最喜欢的游戏厂家之一，期待R星出佳作
R星牛逼！

73851248.review:
Graphical instability aside, the singleplayer experience is pretty great. If you only want to play the singleplayer, I highly recommend this game.

HOWEVER
The multiplayer side of the game is 100% worthless. Missions given by npc "strangers" fail to pay you in any currency, and the main missions will always culminate in a black screen with a loading icon that will continue for a few minutes until it tells you that you've been disconnected from the server. The value of items/loot/payout is inflated in multiplayer to slow your progress and encourage you to instead purchase currency with real money in order to make any sort of progress without needing to fight the horrendous server disconnect issues to grind it out. This game suffers from the same issues that killed GTAV for me and many others. At this point, it almost seems intentional for the servers to be this bad. If you have no interest in playing through the singleplayer and purely want to play multiplayer, save your money. It's trash. You'll spend more time at loading screens, re-launching the game, and trying to get in the same session and posse with your friends than you will actually playing any of the multiplayer content - and at the end of it all you get nothing except a disconnect message.

72589896.review:
荒野大镖客2完美地展示了1899年美国亡命徒的一切，对我来说这确实是一个近乎完美的游戏，RPG玩家不可能不喜欢。
如果要找一个游戏来类比的话，我觉得荒野大镖客2是天国拯救的超级威力加强版（当然我很喜欢天国拯救）
它开头的慢节奏可能让很多人一下子无法接受，但这也确实逐渐营造出了一种沉浸式体验，大量的角色，对话和可探索收集的内容，并不是完全无意义的填充，确实能感受到制作组的用心。
故事的叙述和游戏的gameplay相当好地结合在了一起，它有着一个好的故事所需要的一切：充满个人魅力的主角，风格迥异的团队，跌宕起伏的情节，十分特色的世界观背景，还有最最重要的一点——角色的成长性，在游戏过程中能真切的感受到所有角色的变化，许多的心路历程，正是这让所有的角色鲜活了起来。如果非要说有什么瑕疵，我觉得可能是史诗感应该做得更好一点，不过游戏内基本所有播片都是即时演算的，无法通过CG来加强这一点，无可厚非。
除开主线剧情外，游戏内的白色支线也都做的非常非常优秀，有深邃的剧情，也有幽默的插曲，都是精心准备的内容，绝不是拖长游戏时间的垃圾内容。即使是内容很短的突发事件，也能感受到用心和细节。
射击游戏的战斗系统我不懂，无法评价，像射击手感和武器种类这种，反正对我来说本质是无双游戏，爽就完事了
打猎系统其实做的挺有趣的，但是教学里根本没讲完美皮毛是什么条件！！！导致我拿弓射鳄鱼之类的浪费了几个小时。结果要先观察，看动物品质，然后不同动物要用不同武器，最后要求弱点一击毙命。另外打猎完大的皮毛只能带一个回去也很讨厌，打猎做的各种背包通关之后居然可以直接买（还好我只做了一个
钓鱼我钓了几次之后，对我来说就完全没有乐趣，只是折磨了
总的来说，毕竟是打磨多年的大作，对细节的打磨可以说是吹毛求疵，基本所有内容都是尽善尽美，"是电子游戏的奇迹！“

73897983.review:
First game that I completed without using fast travel.
[u]Single player review.[/u]

[h1]Graphics[/h1]
Game looks awesome - rocks slide from hills when you walk over them, sun shines trough trees and fog. They managed to capture atmosphere of different zones - from cold north, to hot south. It looks so good, that you want visit USA after playing this game.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
Attention to details is insane: animals and people react to character, camping, best horse mechanics and riding I've seen so far, world full of Easter eggs and events (some can be repetitive - one guy was 3 times bitten by snake). Modern physics - objects can be destroyed, fire from molotov can burn whole house, stones slide down from hills if you step on them, good ragdolls and collisions.
World feels alive, especially in camp - reminds me of Gothic 2.
Fishing and hunting can be addictive - spent 2 hours hunting legendary fox.
Game can be chill\calm (one of the reasons why I didn't used fast travel) and full of crazy action with train robberies and chases.
Crafting is good, but can be improved.

[h1]Shooting and gunplay[/h1]
I think shooting compared to other aspects of the game looks weak. It didn't go far from GTA - point, click and enemy dead. You don't "feel" weapons (apart from Double barreled), duels could be much more detailed, dead eye is boring - you press button, time slows and select targets for your character to shoot at.
On the bright side - good animations, visuals and wound marks. Hats can be shot off from heads, horses drag dead bodies etc.

[h1]Story and characters[/h1]
One of the best stories in gaming. It makes you think not only about the game itself, but about real life and people that surround you.
Cool characters - all made very well and interesting (different point of views, stories etc.). Atmosphere in camp changes based on events in game. Some are guarding camp, other are cooking and work on different chores in camp, leader is planning, and drunk Uncle sleeps under a tree.


[i]Thank you Arthur, that was a good time.[/i]

无论是故事性，还是画面的精致程度都是无与伦比的。西部点子王出的点子，让这个帮派从雪山迁居河边、沼泽、湖边，一步一步让帮派走向灭亡。亚瑟作为本作的主角，真的是个战神，所有任务的必要人员。从一次简单的收债让亚瑟染上肺结核，每次任务结束之后一个人不停的咳嗽，到最后完成自己的救赎，把希望留给约翰。这不得不说是一个十分完美的故事。
在游戏人物的配音，真的是费了很多心思，大概花了5年的时间，这就让这个游戏的人物显得特别饱满。在剧情中一个个死去的人物，也就让人觉得惋惜。迈卡必死！
游戏的感人点有很多。营救杰克，和玛丽看剧，和最后的末章亚瑟的死，约翰的幸福农场主生活。不得不感叹R星的大制作，这波我吹爆。

73870127.review:
TL;DR: This is a horrible port. Too many graphical and online bugs to count. I would not recommend buying at this time. 

Story mode is great and works fine but online server stability and bugs make that portion of the game unbearable. I've been trying to play online with a buddy and we repeated the same story mission 3 times in hopes it saves progress, but the game fails to reconnect to the server every time we finish the mission. Thus, progress is lost. Furthermore, the servers are horribly unstable. We often get random disconnects. 

Graphical problems are a major issue too. I run a GTX 1050 Ti and run the game using the nvidia experience recommended settings. By doing this everything in the game (story and online) looks very blurry especially when moving. I have improved this by turning TAA off and adjusting the resolution scale to around 1.25. It makes the game more bearable and less like I am looking through bad prescription glasses but it still looks and feels nothing like the PS4 experience. My friend runs a GTX 970 and he has a horrible graphical flicking bug.

I'd love to go into detail about how much fun this game can be online with a group of friends, but of the currently 7 hours I have in this game, only a handful of minutes of that were spent actually playing the game. The rest of the time was spent in the solo tutorial section, sitting through absurdly-lengthy loading times, and stuck in countless post-mission infinite loading screens that all led boots from the online session.

Over and over again, at random intervals in a session, my game would completely freeze up for entire minutes at a time before booting me from online sessions, effectively rendering online unplayable, and no, it's not a hardware issue, trust me. All of this pushed my play time well past the 2-hour refund time-limit, so I guess I'm SOL. I can't and won't go over ever other little problem here, you can find those in actual reviews, which this is not.

This is a warning. I wholeheartedly advise you to stay away from this title.

73658981.review:
** This review is not about the gameplay **

I wasn't able to play the game properly. This console port is nothing but a bullshit. Here is why:
- No alt+tab when in fullscreen the game either freezes forever or crashes. DX12 + borderless MAYBE a solution (didn't work for me) 
- You can access steam overlay only with DX12 if you try it with vulkan, well... It will stuck forever. 
- DX12 kills you fps. I got 100+ with Vulkan on High settings and ~37 with DX12. 
- Benchmark is just silly. Endless loop of scenes without any realtime info. You need to stop the benchmark to get scarce info: min, max, average. Plus it's very inaccurate. 

Can't say anything about the gameplay. Maybe it's as good as people say but after an hour of attempts to fix something that should be fixed long ago by Rockstar, I just hit the refund button.
